name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Cloud Engineer with 8 years of experience, specializing in delivering scalable solutions within cloud environments and proficient in **AWS**, **GCP**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **Docker**, **Jenkins**, **Kubernetes**, **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, and **Graphite**. Expert in implementing CI/CD pipelines, Infrastructure as Code strategies, and Cloud Security protocols to ensure robust and secure deployments, employing methodologies such as Blue/Green Deployment and Continuous Deployment.

Proficient in programming languages including **Python**, **Bash**, **Golang**, and **Java**, with a strong foundation in full-stack development. My background includes developing enterprise-grade platforms utilizing modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and back-end technologies like **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have successfully led initiatives integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation while ensuring compliance with industry standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
